title: News digest [No. 8]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Silent players at Benalla - headquarters of the Gliding Club of Victoria; antique pistols are shown by collectors of arms; a bullock team at work hauling timber at Yellingbo; an old Chinese market gardener on his daily round; and a student riding the monocycle he made.
